name: You and me
description:
A little bird gets taken from his nest and needs to find his way back home. He finds an axolotl and he wants to help him find clues to his mother's nest.

The feather's mark the way back to his mother.

To play press a and d to move and tab to switch between characters. The bird can jump and the axolotl can swim.

Had a really busy week and only got code on the last day, but hopefully you can see what we were going for =)
